articles.author: Michelle Solomon
articles.title: State not releasing COVID numbers on Christmas - WPLG Local 10
articles.description: The state will not be releasing new coronavirus data on Friday due to the Christmas holiday, according to the Florida Department of Health.
articles.content:
TALLAHASSEE, Fla. The daily release of Floridas coronavirus data will not be updated by the Florida Department of Health due to the Christmas holiday, it was announced Friday.
